医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究发现精液微生物组对男性生育能力的影响精液微生物群与精液参数变化之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/New-research-finds-semen-microbiomes-impact-on-male-fertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/New-research-finds-semen-microbiomes-impact-on-male-fertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72f70165-72b9-493c-b297-142bd9f5af4a Mon, 15 Jan 2024 07:20:00 -0500 New research finds semen microbiome's impact on male fertility
新研究表明通用冠状病毒疫苗可以为美国节省数十亿美元2019 年冠状病毒病 (COVID-19) 通用疫苗的流行病学、临床和经济价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Universal-Coronavirus-vaccine-could-save-billions-in-US-new-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Universal-Coronavirus-vaccine-could-save-billions-in-US-new-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fba4e01-a23c-4c4c-b9d3-d5bd2cbcd1e7 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:35:00 -0500 Universal Coronavirus vaccine could save billions in U.S., new study suggests
革命性的人工智能工具可在重症监护中高精度预测肾损伤迹象一种用于预测少尿的机器学习 (ML) 算法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Revolutionary-AI-tool-forecasts-kidney-injury-signs-with-high-accuracy-in-intense-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Revolutionary-AI-tool-forecasts-kidney-injury-signs-with-high-accuracy-in-intense-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=866041a1-6bda-4a20-9b80-441ede481c3a Mon, 15 Jan 2024 06:04:00 -0500 Revolutionary AI tool forecasts kidney injury signs with high accuracy in intensive care
尼古丁对肠道微生物群和新陈代谢的惊人影响被发现尼古丁暴露对宿主营养状况、肠道微生物代谢物和代谢稳态的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Nicotines-surprising-effect-on-gut-microbiota-and-metabolism-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/Nicotines-surprising-effect-on-gut-microbiota-and-metabolism-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=78039d5d-ee32-4259-b29e-faa56c463df9 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 04:50:00 -0500 Nicotine's surprising effect on gut microbiota and metabolism uncovered
国际研究合作在利用 DNA 测序进行抗生素耐药性检测方面取得突破用于诊断目的的屎肠球菌基因组抗生素耐药性测定的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/International-research-collaboration-leads-to-breakthrough-in-antibiotic-resistance-testing-using-DNA-sequencing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240115/International-research-collaboration-leads-to-breakthrough-in-antibiotic-resistance-testing-using-DNA-sequencing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7071e14c-e8c9-4e10-bb26-2e6dbbcda314 Mon, 15 Jan 2024 04:21:00 -0500 International research collaboration leads to breakthrough in antibiotic resistance testing using DNA sequencing
北欧研究表明 mRNA COVID-19 疫苗对于预防青少年住院非常有效研究评估了 mRNA COVID-19 疫苗（BNT162b2、mRNA-1273 和异源疫苗）在预防北欧国家青少年住院方面的有效性，发现六个月时的保护率高达 73% 至 86%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/mRNA-COVID-19-vaccines-highly- effective-in-preventing-hospitalizations-among-adolescents-in-Nordic-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/mRNA-COVID-19-vaccines-highly- effective-in-preventing-hospitalizations-among-adolescents-in-Nordic-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=33f53c7c-24f3-4e84-a7da-a19c134cd9b5 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 22:50:00 -0500 mRNA COVID-19 vaccines highly effective in preventing hospitalizations among adolescents in Nordic study
Paxlovid 治疗 20% 的 COVID-19 患者可避免 85 万人住院，节省高达 1,700 亿美元《新发传染病》杂志上的一项研究显示，使用 Paxlovid 治疗 20% 的 COVID-19 患者可以挽救美国多达 85 万人的生命，并减轻 1701.7 亿美元的经济负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Paxlovid-treatment-in-2025-of-COVID-19-患者-could-avert-850000-hospitalizations-save-up-to-24170-billion。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Paxlovid-treatment-in-2025-of-COVID-19-患者-could-avert-850000-hospitalizations-save-up-to-24170-billion。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdfdfffc-425c-43d9-8353-541b1b67dc14 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 22:22:00 -0500 Paxlovid treatment in 20% of COVID-19 patients could avert 850,000 hospitalizations, save up to $170 billion
新研究发现长期新冠患者的免疫失调研究利用先进的“组学”和血清学检测揭示了长期新冠患者的显着免疫变化，包括 T 细胞反应的改变和全身炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Immune-dysregulation-in-long-COVID-病人-uncovered-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Immune-dysregulation-in-long-COVID-病人-uncovered-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faeb5432-fa20-426f-aa0a-5c4a9f388003 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 21:56:00 -0500 Immune dysregulation in long COVID patients uncovered in new study
二价 COVID-19 疫苗对血栓栓塞事件表现出更高的有效性研究发现，二价 mRNA COVID-19 疫苗在预防老年人和终末期肾病患者的血栓栓塞事件方面比单价疫苗更有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Bivalent-COVID-19-vaccines-show-higher-effectness-against-thrombembbolic-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/Bivalent-COVID-19-vaccines-show-higher-effectness-against-thrombembbolic-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0da6e96-f056-462d-82a9-5964aa1deb07 Sun, 14 Jan 2024 21:37:00 -0500 Bivalent COVID-19 vaccines show higher effectiveness against thromboembolic events
研究表明 JN.1 变体的传播并非由于增强的免疫逃逸研究发现，与其前身 BA.2.86 相比，SARS-CoV-2 的 JN.1 变种可能没有增强免疫逃逸能力，这表明其快速传播还有其他因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/JN1-variants-spread-not-due-to-enhanced-immune-escape-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240114/JN1-variants-spread-not-due-to-enhanced-immune-escape-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=14f8ee3f-e628-4676-aff0-5f7c83d7c18f Sun, 14 Jan 2024 19:21:00 -0500 JN.1 variant's spread not due to enhanced immune escape, study suggests
